game.name: League of Foes
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: League of Foes is a split-screen Multiplayer Local Battle Arena (MLBA) where players strategically push lanes, battle minions, and fight to destroy the enemy's base.
game.shortDescriptionEn: League of Foes is a split-screen Multiplayer Local Battle Arena (MLBA) where players strategically push lanes, battle minions, and fight to destroy the enemy's base.
